iitb.cfilt.cpost

Class ConfigReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • iitb.cfilt.cpost.ConfigReader

  • public class ConfigReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to read the config file. The format of the config file is as follows.

    [Context1]
    var1 = value1
    var2 = value2

    [Context2]
    var1 = value1
    var2 = value2

    Author:
    Dinesh Gadge

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static java.lang.String get(java.lang.String key)

      • printValues

        public static void printValues()
        Prints the values in the HashMap config

      • read

        public static void read(java.lang.String configFile)
        Reads the config file and stores the values in a HashMap. Finally the HashMap contains the values as :
        config.get("Context1.var1") will give value1 in Context1
        config.get("Context2.var2") will give value2 in Context2 etc.
        Parameters:
        configFile - A String giving the path/name of the config File

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        main function to check the working of ConfigReader class.
        Parameters:
        args - args[0] gives the path/name of the config file
